alert.note: Alert for Anson; Montgomery; Moore; Randolph; Richmond; Stanly (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 9:08AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Moore, east central Anson, Montgomery, northern Richmond, southern Randolph, northeastern Stanly and southwestern Chatham Counties through 1000 AM EDT... At 906 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Pinehurst, or 15 miles west of Southern Pines, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Albemarle, Southern Pines, Troy, Carthage, Badin Lake, Pinehurst, Aberdeen, Biscoe, Seagrove and Badin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Anson; Montgomery; Moore; Randolph; Richmond; Stanly
